plot outline: A die-hard Ajith fan, Billa Pandi works as a construction contractor and dedicates the rest of his time to helping others in his neighbourhood. He is in love with his aunt's daughter, Valli, but life drastically changes for him when Jayalakshmi, whose family's house he'd recently constructed, falls in love with him.
title: Billa Pandi
plot: A die-hard Ajith fan, _Billa Pandi_ (qv) works as a construction contractor and dedicates the rest of his time to helping others in his neighbourhood. He is in love with his aunt's daughter, Valli, but life drastically changes for him when Jayalakshmi, whose family's house he'd recently constructed, falls in love with him.
